actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to establish the Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge.
short_title: Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: Establishes the Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge in the states of Virginia and North Carolina. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary for the acquisition of any areas or other interests the acquisition of which is authorized by this Act.

titles.title: Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge Act
A bill to establish the Great Dismal Swamp National Wildlife Refuge.
